TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProxyDataContractResolver extends System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver

Docs.summary: This class helps resolve proxy types that were created for persistence-ignorant data classes to the actual types of persistence-ignorant objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ProxyDataContractResolver> class is used with the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>.

Docs.summary: During deserialization, maps any information to the actual type of the [persistence-ignorant](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3) object.
